  • Implementation phases timeline
  • Success metrics (before/after)
  • Risk assessment
  • Quick reference guide

üìà Implementation Progress Tracking

Use This Checklist

File: BICEP_QUICK_CHECKLIST.md

Each phase has ~10-20 checkbox items. Track progress:

PHASE 1: Core Infrastructure (2 hrs)
‚îú‚îÄ [ ] Update main.bicep parameters
‚îú‚îÄ [ ] Add JWT parameters
‚îú‚îÄ [ ] Add resourceToken variable
‚îú‚îÄ [ ] Call Redis module
‚îú‚îÄ [ ] Call SQL Server module
‚îú‚îÄ [ ] Call Key Vault module
‚îú‚îÄ [ ] Update main.parameters.json
‚îî‚îÄ [ ] Test Phase 1

PHASE 2: Database Setup (1 hr)
‚îú‚îÄ [ ] Update myapp-sqlserver.module.bicep
‚îú‚îÄ [ ] Add 6-database loop
‚îú‚îÄ [ ] Add database outputs
‚îî‚îÄ [ ] Test Phase 2

[... continue for all 8 phases ...]

üéì Learning Resources

Included Best Practices

All documents reference azd (Azure Developer CLI) best practices:

  1. Parameterization over Hardcoding

    • Reference: Comprehensive Audit ‚Üí "Key Learnings: azd Best Practices"

  2. Secure Parameters for Secrets

    • Reference: Remediation Guide ‚Üí Gap #1

  3. Key Vault for Secret Management

    • Reference: Mapping Document ‚Üí "Key Vault Secret Mapping"

  4. Modular Architecture

    • Reference: Comprehensive Audit ‚Üí "Recommendations"

  5. Explicit Dependencies

    • Reference: Remediation Guide ‚Üí Module dependency patterns

External References

  • Azure Developer CLI: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/developer/azure-developer-cli/
  • Bicep Documentation: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/azure-resource-manager/bicep/
  • Container Apps: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/container-apps/

üöÄ Quick Start (3 Steps)

Step 1: Read (15 minutes)

  1. Open BICEP_AUDIT_VISUAL_SUMMARY.md
  2. Scan the dashboards
  3. Understand the scope

Step 2: Plan (10 minutes)

  1. Open BICEP_QUICK_CHECKLIST.md
  2. Review the 8 phases
  3. Schedule time blocks

Step 3: Execute (6-8 hours)

  1. Follow Phase 1 checklist
  2. Reference Remediation Guide for code
  3. Mark checkboxes as you go
  4. Validate at each phase

üéØ Success Criteria

After implementation, verify:

  • ‚úÖ All az bicep build commands pass
  • ‚úÖ All 7 service modules created
  • ‚úÖ All module calls added to main.bicep
  • ‚úÖ Key Vault integration working (enableKeyVault: true)
  • ‚úÖ 6 databases created in SQL Server
  • ‚úÖ All environment variables set
  • ‚úÖ azd deploy succeeds
  • ‚úÖ All 6 services running in Container Apps
  • ‚úÖ API Gateway accessible publicly
  • ‚úÖ Services communicate via service discovery
